sources.title: Dixiana (1930)
sources.description: A circus performer falls in love with the son of a plantation owner in antebellum New Orleans. When the young man's stepmother objects to the wedding, the couple break apart and go their separate ways for a time. Also in the mix are two circus comics who feud over the heart of another Southern belle. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/dixiana-1930/

sources.title: Dixiana (1930)
sources.description: Dixiana, a circus performer is wooed by two men, a plantation owner's son and a crooked gambler. Mystic Nights Videos

sources.title: Dixiana (1930) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD

This PizzaFLIX version restores the lavish Technicolor end sequence which was believed to be lost.

In antebellum New Orleans, two men vie for the affections of a beautiful young girl during Mardi Gras.

sources.title: Dixiana ( 1930) Comedy, Drama, Music Pre Code Movie
sources.description: Dixiana (Bebe Daniels), a Louisiana songstress, is coveted by both playboy Royal Montague (Ralf Harolde) and well-off Carl Van Horn (Everett Marshall). Initially, she pledges herself to Carl, but, when his mother (Jobyna Howland) objects to her lifestyle and her show business friends Peewee (Bert Wh eeler) and Ginger (Robert Woolsey), Dixiana finds her engagement on the skids. Royal tries to capitalize on the breakup, but Dixiana, hoping to rekindle her romance, has several tricks up her sleeve.

sources.title: Dixiana 1930 [colorised, 4k, 60FPS]
sources.description: Dixiana 1930 is a  black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @ https://colab.research.google.com/  Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: https://rife-vfi.github.io  A.I. Upscaling to 4K: https://ffmpeg.org  GPU: Google Colab
